Identity.Name: Krieg, The Relentless
Identity.Basic_Description: A large apocolyptic style warriro with pipes and rods sticking out of their body weilding a large axe

Abilities.Name: Unrelenting
Abilities.Ability: If this unit has more distress than health, it does not die until the end of the round.

Abilities.Name: Berserk
Abilities.Ability: If this unit is adjacent to an opponents unit, it must attack that unit.
